transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Haanji.
Customer: Hello? Ji yes sir. Haanji. Main apni screen main apni screen present kar rahi hu sir aapko haan mujhe ek baar bataiyega aap.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Ji. Abhi meri screen visible hai sir aapko?
Customer: Haanji, visible hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: To dekhiye sir, abhi aap ye four by four client aapko yaha pe dikh raha hai. Four by four client means you are highly active. Aap byleads vagerah properly consume kar rahe hain. Aap calls vagerah mein bhi sab active hain.
Executive: Then agar catalog score ki baat karein to 78.9% catalog score hai which is decent enough. And then
Customer: Zara zoom karenge, thoda zoom karenge.
Executive: Ek second. Abhi dikh raha hai sir?
Customer: Abhi dikh raha hai sir?
Customer: Thoda blur blur dikh raha hai.
Executive: Sir ye mera pura maximum hi kar rakha hai maine.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan. Sir dekhiye agar main byleads ki baat karu to aapko proper pura chart dikh raha hoga monthly basis pe ki abhi November mein aapne 16 days mein 53 byleads consume kari hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na? Aur October mein 21 days mein 72 byleads, September mein to aapne 30 days mein 125 byleads consume kari hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Yes. Aur aap jo calls ki baat kar rahe the ki aapko calls bhi dekhni hai to calls bhi main aapko monthly basis pe hi dikha rahi hu. Ki aapne November mein 18 calls receive kari hain and eight calls miss hui hain aapse.
Executive: October mein aapne 35 calls receive kari hain, 15 calls miss hui hain. September mein 41 calls receive kari hain and five calls miss hui hain.
Customer: Kitni call aayi hai October mein?
Executive: Dekhiye na sir, 35 aapne receive kari hain and 15 miss kari hain.
Customer: 35, right?
Executive: Haan, dekhiye na mera jaha pe cursor hai aapko dikh raha hoga sir.
Customer: Aap aap mujhe ek cheez bataiye ye jo har call average jo pad raha hai wo kitne rupaye pad raha hai? Matlab month mein 30 din hote hain. 30 din mein aapka call aata hai mere paas agar maan lijiye October ek highly matlab business deta hai ye month jo hai October, September ye matlab ekdam peak pe rehta hai business ye samajh rahe ho na? Jis item ka need rehta hai jo hum banate hain usi cheez ka ekdam daba ke chalta hai. To is itne matlab itne demanding month mein bhi sirf 33 call aa rahe hain ye to bahut kam average hai matlab dekha jaaye to.
Executive: 35 calls mein 15 miss hui hain to total to 50 calls aaye na aapko pure mein. Suniye na sir.
Customer: 15 miss aisa ki aapka main batau aisa to hai nahi ek aadmi ek hi baar call karta hai bahut se aise bhi hote hain jo ek jin ko nahi pata ki aapka sir number kya hai wo IndiaMART pe call karte hain lekin whatsapp pe baat karte rehte hain. Unka call miss bhi ho jata hai to ye mobile miss call hote hain waise miss hota nahi hai call mein aapko batau jaha tak mujhe laga hai aur ye aapne jo bata rahe ho aap ye 18 call liye yaha pe kitna call hai ye November mein?
Executive: 18 calls receive kare hain aur eight calls miss hue hain.
Customer: 18 calls aaye aaj aaj tarikh ho gayi mam 21. Hmm. Theek hai na? 21 mein sirf 18 call aaye matlab bahut kam average chal raha hai ye kya dikkat hai ye aap mujhe bataiye na ye bahut matlab per call average dekhiye na aap kitne rupaye pad raha hai aapko. Per day mein ek call aata hai maan lijiye per day mein ek call aata hai aapke paas average leke chalte hain. Per day mein ek call aata hai wo ek call bhi agar wo bande ne ye khali isliye kar diya sir main aise hi inquiry kar raha tha kitne ka padega kaise kaise milega aur kaise kaise pochega bas nahi chahiye mujhe mal nahi chahiye to wo to waste ho gaya fir to. Pura din aap baithoge to.
Executive: Sir aap nahi nahi sir dekho aap jo calls ki baat kar rahe ho na ki abhi matlab jitni bhi aapko receive hui hai aapke comparison mein wo kam hai kyuki aap
Customer: Haan bilkul kam hai bahut kam hai.
Executive: Kam hai. To sir dekho ye jo calls aapko puri receive hoti hai na calls aapko jo aa rahi hai jo byleads aapko mil rahi hai sir ye aap kaisa apna portal use kar rahe ho kitna active ho ye us pe depend karta hai sir.
Customer: To mam aapka kehna ye hai ki activation bahut badhiya hai lekin fir bhi call kam hai to sir ye kuch samajh nahi aaya ye kaise possible hai. Aap bol rahe ho ki ek taraf aap active bhi bahut badhiya ho byleads bhi sahi consume kar rahe ho lekin fir bhi call kam aa rahi ho. To aap mujhe wo cheez bataiye fir dikkat kaha aa rahi hai usko solve kara jayega agar dikkat jaha hai.
Executive: Kyuki sir dekho jo calls calls mein hume kya hota hai sir ek to hamare catalog ke basis pe aati hai ki hamara jitna achcha catalog ka score hota hai call utni achchi aati hai.
Customer: Catalog aap dekhiye kitne percent catalog hai aap mera score dekhiye kitne kitne percent 79% hai aur jo product upload hai wo kitne kitne score pe hai sab 100, 95, 89, 87 right na? Matlab kafi better hai.
Executive: Exactly. Haan kafi aapka catalog score wahi main aapko bol rahi hu aapka catalog score bhi sahi hai aur aap byleads pe bhi active. Haan. To us according to dekho aapka fir bhi fir bhi mam call kyu kam hai main ye cheez janna chahta hu jab aapka jo jis month mein aapke paas ekdam bhar ke business aana chahiye usi month mein aapke paas bahut kam business aa raha hai ye ye to kuch match hi nahi hua na mam fir to fir waste hai fir to paisa hamara. Jab jis month mein aapko call pahuchna chahiye aap mera last last year ka data utha ke dekhiye aap mere last year mein bhi jayenge zara October mein same jis Diwali tha jis time pe last year ka.
Customer: Ye kab ka hai?
Customer: Sir 24 ka dekhiye na.
Executive: Kiska bol rahe hain sir kiska dikha du?
Customer: Last year ka.
Executive: Last year ka? Ye dekhiye sir main abhi wahi dekh rahi thi ki December mein bhi to sir aapko ye 42 calls receive hui then 25 fir 31, 27, 22, 37 December nahi hai mam thoda aur piche aaiye December se. Aap Diwali ke time pe dekhiye Diwali ke time pe aaiye. Jis time pe jyada business rehta hai us time pe dekhenge na fir last year mein aur is year mein kitna difference aaya hai. Aap chahte hain ki main 2024 ka October November ka dikhau aapko. Right, right.
Executive: Sir yaha pe to abhi dekho aapke samne chart khula hai sir mujhe December se dikh raha hai.
Customer: December se piche nahi ja sakte?
Executive: Nahi sir December ka dekh le ek baar main dekh leti hu agar piche ja sakte hain to. Bilkul dekhiye.
Executive: Aap main aapko batau ki hum jo business kar rahe hain theek hai na? Nahi sir ye hume December ka hi December se hi dikh raha hai. But sir calls na. Haan. But sir agar December se bhi agar hum dekhe sir to aapka flow to wahi maintain hai na 42 then idhar 25 hua fir 31 matlab up down utna jyada difference nahi hai. Idhar aap bata rahe ho ki 42 call aaya uske baad directly 25 pe matlab kitna percent gir gaya mam 50% gir gaya. Sir dekhiye ye January ka nahi nahi sir ye January ka hai theek hai 2025 starting hai. Thand jyada hai kya nahi nahi sir baat to suniye. January mein aa jate hain. Sir aap baat to suniye pehle ek baar ek ek clear karte hue chalte hain na sir January ka ab January discuss karne se pehle January pura clear kar lete hain. Sir January mein aap kya 25 calls aapko receive hui hai aur 14 miss hui hai theek hai. Chaliye 14 miss hui. Yaha pe yaha pe jo aapka ye calls ka flow hai sir ye depend kiya hoga ki aap us time apne byleads vagerah mein kitne active hain kitna aap usko use kar rahe hain. Calls hamari sir is pe depend karti hai. Main aapko batau jo last year ka mera jata hai experience hai mera last year se is year mein bahut kam business hai main aapko batau. Bahut kam business hai na last year aapko achcha business gaya tha. Okay. Haan ya ya right. Aur same package hai same sab kuch hai serious manager us time bhi thi is time pe bhi thi but aisa kya hua jo wo wo usi year se leke is year mein matlab itna matlab itne bas itne chances mein kyuki jab hum IndiaMART pe hamara ek saal hua tha matlab naya naya tha abhi humne do saal mein package liya to teen saal dikhata hai wo theek hai na to us time pe IndianMART itna kar raha tha hamari hume theek hai na hum upar bhi dikhate the pata hai main aapko batau main second number pe tak se apni position dekhi jaha tak mujhe pata hai. To sir aap seedha seedha 13 mein number pe suniyega pehle meri to aapka second number pe 13 number pe mam bahut jyada piche ho gaye main aapko batau. Sir wahi hai na ki aapke product mein suniye sir suniye sir aap do number se 30 number par kaise aa gaye sir aapka jo product line hai aap dekho na competition dekho sir. Kitna competition hai har insan sir TrustSeal aur isse upar wali services le raha hai maximizer le raha hai to sir jo jaisi services lega fir uski visibility waise badhti jati hai. TrustSeal? Yes sir aapke product line mein competition dekhiye sir maine aapke samne khol kar rakha hai aap dekhiye. Hmm. Ye hamara dikha raha hai. Dekhiye aap haan ye Neha glass aapko yaha pe dikha raha hai kis number pe dikha raha hai teen do panch che saat aath nave number mein aapka dikha raha hai sir. Nave number pe dikha raha hai ye aapka dikha raha hai Firozabad mein right? Yes aap hi ka hai na sir Neha glass decorators Firozabad. Right mera hi hai ye Firozabad dikha raha hai main chahta hu pan India ki baat kar raha hu main Firozabad ki baat hi nahi kar raha jaha tak main chahta hu waha to sabko pata hi hai item kitne ka ban raha hai kitne ka bik raha hai duniya ko pata hai. Samajh rahe ho na? To bahar ki baat karte hain. Sir sir ye maine sirf Firozabad ka nahi ye aapko main pan India hi dikha rahi hu. Achcha abhi to aap bol rahe hain 30 number pe hai ye aapka kaise. Main ruk jaiye sir aap ek minute. Okay. Ab aapko Firozabad ka dikhati hu theek hai. Firozabad Firozabad mat dikhaiye to better hi hoga. Nahi dekh lijiye sir ab aap ab Firozabad agar dekhe to aap dusre number pe sir dusre number pe hi to aa rahe hain aap Firozabad mein bhi. Mujhe pata hai mam mujhe pata hai ki Firozabad mein upar dikhayega kyuki main yaha ka hu. Yaha ka main nahi hu main chahta hu waha pe dikhna chahiye aap ye cheez samjhiye. To aap chahte hain ki aap Firozabad mein nahi agar aap pan India mein bhi hai tab bhi aap do number pe haan upar dikhe. To teen char panch tak to theek rehta hai main aapko batau itna to aadmi haan call ka flow bhi badh jata hai aadmi main aapko batau agar maan lijiye agar main hi ek buyer hu main aaunga portal pe dekhunga haan ye bhi badhiya ye bhi badhiya ye log ye item bana rahe hain ye item bana rahe hain lekin main itne upar tak nahi jaunga ki 10 15 16 mein 17 mein 18 mein number pe main ja ke dekhu. Main koshish karunga ki upar wale ko hi char panch mere wale tak jaha tak mujhe lage iska rate badhiya lag raha hai quality badhiya lag raha hai review badhiya lag raha hai usko main ho sakta hai inquiry dal du ya call kar du. Samajh sir wahi to main aapko bol rahi hu aap buyer ki buyer ki nazar se sochiye na aap ek ek jab aap jab last year aap business kar rahe the same portal same package sab kuch same but aapke paas sir dekhiye us time jaisa competition sir aap baat suniye us time jaisa competition tha sir aapki positioning waisi thi abhi sir ab aaj ke time mein kitne log us ek saal mein kitne aapke jo same product line mein hamare sath deal kar rahe hain wo kitne jude honge unhone aapse upar wala package liya hoga maximizer liya hoga sir to unki visibility waise maintain ho rahi hai sir package pe bhi to depend karta hai na sirf ye thodi hai ki aapne TrustSeal le liya to aap hamesha ke liye do ek number aur do number pe hi dekhoge aap maximizer haan hum thoda plan abhi upgrade karte hain fir apna maximizer ki taraf jate hain thoda aap pehle number pe aap pehle dusre mein dikhne lag jaoge. Theek hai maximizer mein aap bol rahe ho maximizer mein chale jayenge usme koi badi ye hai mam lekin business to bahut jyada kam ho gaya na mam maximizer mein jane ke liye business to hona chahiye. Ab aap bataiye jaise ki aap waha pe job kar rahe ho IndiaMART mein main Neha glass mein job kar raha hu mujhe iska mujhe kam mila hai ki wahi mal becho to salary milega. Samajh rahe ho na? Kya keh rahe hain bol rahe hain kya hoga kya hoga? Salary to mam tab milega jab hum ye mal sale karenge ye goods jo hai. Hmm hmm. To sir dekho mal bhi tabhi sale hota hai jab hum aas paas ke competition dekhte hain jaisi requirement hoti hai sir hum us hisab se upgrade karte hain. Hai na? Mam lekin main aapko batau owner ko to sale chahiye. Samajh rahe ho na aap? Sir main aapko whatsapp call sir main whatsapp call kar rahi hu thoda sa break ho rahi hai aapki voice. Theek hai aap mujhe whatsapp call kariye okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states call average is very low.

- Wants to see last year's data for comparison.

- States business is very low compared to last year.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the buyleads and calls data.

- Executive explained the importance of catalog score.

- Executive explained the competition in the product line.

- Executive suggested upgrading to maximizer package.

- Executive offered to connect via WhatsApp call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect via WhatsApp call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, calls, catalog score, maximizer, competition
